sn35.62:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you the Dhamma for the exhaustion of all clinging. Listen to that … "And what, bhikkhus, is the Dhamma for the exhaustion of all clinging?2What do you think, bhikkhus, is the eye permanent or impermanent?"…To be completed as in §32…sn.iv.35
sn35.62:2: 1"Bhikkhus, I will teach you the Dhamma for the exhaustion of all clinging. Listen to that … "And what, bhikkhus, is the Dhamma for the exhaustion of all clinging?What do you think, bhikkhus, is the eye permanent or impermanent?"…To be completed as in §3…sn.iv.35
